pageContext.claim: “Children are terribly used by criminals and coyotes to gain access to our country—they are the biggest victims of all.”
pageContext.analysis: Coyotes and smugglers do operate along the border. But Trump suggests they pose as parents or legal guardians to gain admission to the United States. It is well established that thousands of Central American families are trying to immigrate and that thousands of unaccompanied children are also apprehended at the southern border each month. Border officials screen for false claims of parentage.
